+-----------------------------+------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| Action                      | Code                                           | Notes                                          |
+=============================+================================================+================================================+
| Delete remote branch        | `git push <remote_name> --delete <branchname>` | in most cases `<remote_name>` will be `origin` |
+-----------------------------+------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| Delete local branch         | `git branch -d <branchname>`                   | only deletes if merged                         |
+-----------------------------+------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| Merge `feature` into `main` | `git checkout main`                            |                                                |
|                             |                                                |                                                |
|                             | `git merge feature`                            |                                                |
+-----------------------------+------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
| New branch and switch       | `git checkout -b <newbranch>`                  |                                                |
+-----------------------------+------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
|                             |                                                |                                                |
+-----------------------------+------------------------------------------------+------------------------------------------------+
